# Pride (Drawback)
## Overview
**Pride:** You can't abide challenges to your dignity, authority, or honor. When someone threatens, accuses, or challenges you, you take a â€”2 penalty on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks involving that creature until the creature apologizes to you.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
